Section 1: Load and Factor data
```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(posterior)
library(bayesplot)
library(bayestestR)


df_y2 <- read.csv("C:/Users/kokeshem/Spring 2026/Advanced Data Analysis/BIOS6624/Project1/DataProcessed/project1_clean_final.csv") %>%
  mutate(
    hard_drugs_bl = factor(hard_drugs_bl, levels = c("No", "Yes")),
    adh_cat       = factor(adh_cat, levels = c("At least 95%", "Below 95%")),
    race_cat_bl   = factor(race_cat_bl, levels = c("White (NH)", "Other")),
    educ_cat_bl   = factor(educ_cat_bl, levels = c("No College Degree", "College+")),
    smoke_cat_bl  = factor(smoke_cat_bl, levels = c("Non-Current Smoker", "Current Smoker"))
  )

print(df_y2 %>% summarise(n_rows = n(), n_ids = n_distinct(newid)))
```
